Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: [dressed as Carrie Bradshaw] Wow you guys look amazing. Stanley, I thought you hated Halloween.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: [dressed as Raggedy Ann] Shh. He wears that so he can sleep at his desk. Who are you?

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Oh, I'm Carrie Bradshaw from Sex And The City.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Mm. I like your shoes. [Kelly has 5-inch heels on]

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Thank you. Will you help walk me to the fax machine?

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Sure.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: I got her, I got her. I can help you. You look amazing.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Inappropriate. Thank you. Who are you, Larry King?

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Gordon Gekko.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Oh, from the insurance commercials!

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: ... Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [Creed dressed as the Joker enters] Whoa. Awesome.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Let's put a smile on that face!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [also dressed as the Joker] Dammit Creed! I've been up since four!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [dressed as a kitten] Meow. Sweet 'stume, dude. Who are you supposed to be?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Dave.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Cool.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You are? [Andy hisses] A cat?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [buzzer noise] We were looking for "kitten."

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [phone] Oh, hang on one second. Jim Halpert.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey New York, Happy Halloween!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Thanks. My costume's getting a lot of attention. [Pam is dressed as Charlie Chaplin]

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: So apparently no one dresses up for Halloween here. I wish I had known that before I used greasepaint for my moustache. And I can't even take off my hat, because then I'm Hitler.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [dressed as the Joker] Hm mm mm mm. Want to see a magic trick? Heh heh heh! I'm gonna make a pencil disapp- oh! [elevator doors close, reopen.] Disappear.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, I think we are set. We have puzzles, string for Cat's Cradles. Burned this last night. A little road trip CD. Puppets.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh, look at all this stuff! It's only seven hours.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: When Corporate found out that we were dating, they decided they were going to transfer Holly back to her old branch, in Nashua, New Hampshire.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Michael is taking a personal day to move me up.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Road trip! Right?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Breaker one-nine, copy?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, copy that breaker. Those Duke boys are at it again.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Hey! Do Not Touch My Radio.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We're not.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Kidding.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We're not doing anything.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: It's been a weird week since we found out I had to transfer. Michael wanted me to quit and get some job here in Scranton, and I said "Well, why don't you quit and get some job in Nashua?" And he said "I asked you first." And I said "First!" at the same time he did. And then I said "Jinx." And then we never talked about it again and haven't been back to the conversation. So...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: All right everybody. I'm out of here. Jim, you're in charge.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, I'll walk you out.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ah, you are quite the gentleman.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You can let people go a couple of minutes early if you want.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: All right. We'll see. [to camera] No.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I am off to New York. My brother Pete from Boston, and my brother Tom from New Jersey are taking Pam and I out for lunch, to celebrate the engagement. Or maybe to beat me up. I can never tell with those two.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Good morning temp.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: 'Morning. [Dwight reveals Cornell sweatshirt] Wow. Good morning Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Thought I'd go casual today. Morning everyone. Good morning. Hello. How are you Phyllis?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ha ha ha. That's funny. [angrily] Take that sweatshirt off! Hey buddy.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Remember when I jokingly yelled at you to take your sweatshirt off? Totally joking. But, you should know, those colors are sacred. Not that I care. But if you're not a Cornell man, you probably shouldn't wear them.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No I get it. I totally understand. And uh, I just want to assure you, that I mean no disrespect. You see, I'm applying!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Come on, you think you can get into Cornell?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Well if somebody who barely out-sells Phyllis, can get in, I should be fine.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: I'm sitting right here Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I meant that as a compliment to you Phyllis, as well as a slight to Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Cornell is a good school, and I want to better myself through higher education. If it makes Andy angry, so be it. [He sips from his Cornell mug]

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I have to unpack this weekend but maybe next weekend we go to the outlets!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Cool!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Mike you'll drive this every weekend?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We're gonna switch back and forth, the driving. Sometimes we'll just meet in the middle. It'll be fun. Wait a sec. Oh I love this song.

Quote.Speaker: Michael and Holly
Quote.Text: Life is a highway, I want to ride it all night long.

Quote.Speaker: Michael, Holly, and Darryl
Quote.Text: If you're going my way, I wanna drive you all night long! If you're going my way...

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hey there. So uh, how do you think we're gonna do against Penn this year? Nathan Ford's arm looks pretty strong.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well he's had a pretty good season so far-- Stop saying "we." You did not go to Cornell. Okay, you're just doing this to screw with me.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Not so. Cornell is an excellent school. Without its agricultural program, we probably wouldn't have cabbage. At least not modern cabbage.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I know it's an excellent school, Dwight. I went there. My blood runs Big Red.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Someday, we'll both get together in Comstock Hall and just laugh about all of this.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey!

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: Hey, future baby sis!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: How are you Tom. Nice to see you.

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: I'm good.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I asked Tom and Pete to come early so we could play a prank on Jim at lunch! Pretty awesome, right? I think they're into the idea. They're probably thinking, "That Pam Beasly, she's the coolest sister-in-law on the planet. She's the best! The absolute best."

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay, so here's what I'm thinking. I'm gonna say that before ceramics class, I took off my ring, and then when I changed back out of my smock, it wasn't in my pocket anymore, and I lost it.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: That's perfect. You know what would be even more hilarious? Remember that thing we did when Jim was in high school with his girlfriend?

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: Right! That would be hilarious! We should totally dog her, about being an artist, never making any money!

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: That, is awesome!

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: Like she basically has a hobby, for a job.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Oh yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: So, not the ring then? The- the- Not doing the ring?

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: I think this is better.

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: The other thing would "get" Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: This is nicer, it's fun. It's fun!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay, okay.

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: Oh, he hates it when we pick on his girlfriends.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oookay....

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: They came up with that idea really fast.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: This trip was longer than I thought.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yeah it did look shorter on the map-

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Ah! Ah! Ahhhh! [waking up] Hey. Whew. Ow. I was having a nightmare.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You were sleeping? You were talking before.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Was I? Really? Was I saying anything interesting?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Not really.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: All right. What's the scoop, how far?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Four hours. Almost halfway there.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: We're only halfway?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Halfway! Okay, You know what I want to do, I want to pull over and find little bed and breakfast for when we meet in the middle. Emphasis on the bed. And the breakfast.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Next exit isn't for five miles.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Let's check there.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey guys.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey, how are you?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hi! [smooches]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Good to see you.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Nice to see you again, Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: Pam, I haven't seen you in so, so long!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: All right so now we can sit... and get comfortable.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: There's nothing out here man.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah. I don't know I just- I imagined a hotel right here. Pool, over here. Really good breakfast place. With really good bacon.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Here we go, fourth time's a charm. "Life's like a road where you just... one day here, and the next day back...Sometimes you deal with it, today you don't, sometimes you do, what you want... there's a world out there.... [Holly sobs] Hey. Are you crying?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Allergies?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Did Darryl touch you?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: WHAT!?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No, Darryl did not touch me. Can we just keep going, please? [crying]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: What's the matter?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: It's not gonna work.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Sure it is.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: There's too much distance.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh no no no.. It's gonna work, it'll be fine.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Michael we've only been dating each other for a few weeks

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Listen to me. I like you so much.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: And I like you too.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: And I've dated four women in the last-

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I've dated four guys last year too.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Not last - no. In like the last ten years.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I've dated almost four women, and you are so far above them, it is stupid.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Michael. Don't. Don't. Don't make it harder than it has to be.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's what she said.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Holly thinks that this relationship is over. Well, you know what? I am not gonna give up that easy. I'm gonna make this way harder than it needs to be.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Take that down. [Dwight has hung a large red Cornell banner from the ceiling]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Excuse me?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Take. That down.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: You know I once dated a couple of guys from Cornell. They were really nice. They gave me a ride home.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I seriously doubt that anyone from Cornell dated you.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: It's pronounced Ker-nell. It's the highest rank in the military.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: It's pronounced "Corn-ell!" It's the highest rank in the Ivy League!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Andy, let's just talk about this man-to-man, after work.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Fine.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What do you say?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, good. Can we-- [Dwight pulls out Cornell mascot bobble-head] Grr. Heh heh heh. That's Big Red Bear! That's a bobble Big Red Bear! God!!

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: If you leave on Friday, by five, you'll be rolling in at... midnight? At best?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: And then sleep in Saturday. That only leaves us less than 24 hours before you have to go back again.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, okay. I will talk to you on the Bluetooth the entire trip. So we're talking constantly all the way.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'll tell you everything that I see. Everything that I pass by, things that I witness on the road.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Well-

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Maybe I'll see an accident one weekend?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: How long could we keep that up?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Years!

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Years?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Years? Of just a few hours every weekend?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Here's my wish. I want you to meet a great guy, and I want you to be happy.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [kisses his temple] Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: My wish has come true, incidentally, because, you've met me, and you are happy.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Clever, Mike.

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: So Pam, how much does an artist make after they leave art school?

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Yeah, not a lot of money in the arts, right?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That's not really true. There's a lot of things you can do with an art degree actually.

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: Maybe Pam should pay the check by drawing a picture on this napkin.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Wow, that's- that's a little rude. What's your deal?

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Hey, just having fun Jimmy.

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: Yeah. Right Pam?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yup! [Tom and Pete give Halpertian looks to camera]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know what? I think we're a great couple. I think we're a classic couple. I think we're like Romeo and Juliet. I think we... go together so well. We're like peanut butter and jelly, don't you think?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I do, I think so.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Then don't do it. Please don't do this. Please don't do this. [they continue arguing]

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [leaving someone a message on his cell phone, looking very uncomfortable] Hey what's up, I just thought I'd try you. I was thinking about that story where you ran into the girl you used to babysit.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I don't know what I'm gonna do!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Please call me back.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Please?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You'll be okay

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'm not gonna be okay.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Please...

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You will.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No I won't! I'm not strong! And I'll go back to Jan, and I hate Jan! Oh God!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [outside men's room] You might be interested- [stops when he sees Stanley come out]

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Dwight!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Andy, I've been meaning to ask you, which a cappella group should I join? The Harmoniacs, or the Do-Re-Mi-Go's?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hm. Assuming you had the voice to be in any of them, it's irrelevant. Because I called admissions and it looks like I, will be conducting your university interview.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That's a conflict of interest.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah. Big one. So, should I not let you in now, or do you want to do the interview, and then I won't let you in?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [thinks] Interview.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Excellent. When the hourglass strikes three, then in the room whence employees confer.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: The conference room!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Who are your role models?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: If I had to put Dwight's chances into a percentage, I would say he has none percent chance.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: So, Dane Cook, Jack Bauer, and Eli Whitney. You're doing great.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh wow. This is my niece Vanessa. She's a trumpeter. And, look at her.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Cute.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That must be really fun for you and Marci huh?

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: Yup. She only knows how to play "When the Saints go Marching In."

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Love that one.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Yeah but, she doesn't think she's gonna be like, career musician right?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Here you go again! What is your deal today?

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: Just saying. How many famous trumpeters can you name besides... Louis Armstrong?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Miles Davis.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: One.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Chet ...something.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Half.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: The point is Pam, is there are jobs-

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Dizzy Gillespie.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Also good.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: And there are hobbies. I love baseball more than anything, but you don't see me try to get on the Mets.

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: You don't!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Pete couldn't make the Mets. She's at Pratt. You played JV baseball. Will you lighten up a little bit?

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: I'm just calling it like I see it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I don't know if I'm gonna make any money with art.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Pam, don't worry about it.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I mean it's a very competitive field. But I have a professor who says I have a lot of promise, and if I don't try now, I never will. So...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Guys, what is going on?! [Pete and Tom burst out in laughter]

Quote.Speaker: Tom
Quote.Text: We pranked you!

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: It was Pam's idea. Pam was the mastermind.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: ... Got you.

Quote.Speaker: Pete
Quote.Text: That was killer. I was so close to blowing it.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Let's see how well you know your Big Red history.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Bring it.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Who was Cornell's eighth president?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Dale Raymond Corson!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Mm, I'm sorry that's incorrect. Cornell's seventh president was in fact, James A. Perkins. [writes in a notebook] Comprehension skills, sub-par.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Hmm, interviewing skills, sub-par. [writes in a notebook]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What are you writing? Can't even give Cornell your full attention?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: On the contrary, I'm helping Cornell. By evaluating their interviewers.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Nobody wants ...that, to happen.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Well, when they get my evaluation we'll see if they're interested.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: "Applicant is attempting to blackmail interviewer, showing low moral character."

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: "Interviewer is threatening applicant with an arbitrary review process."

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: "Applicant is wasting everyone's time with stupid and inane accusations."

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: "Interviewer has suspect motives."

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: "Applicant has a head shaped like a trapezoid."

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: "Interviewer has turned off applicant's interest in Cornell, and they are going to go to the vastly superior Dartmouth." Ever heard of it? I think I have everything I need.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I have everything I need- [talking over each other]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And you will be hearing from the -

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: And you will be hearing from -

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: -Cornell Application Department,

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: which I will not be a part of-

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And you will not be pleased with the result. [pulls table away from Andy]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: And YOU will not be pleased with the result!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And your affiliation with Cornell -

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: And your affiliation with Cornell -

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Will end completely!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Will end completely!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [has won the table war] That is all sir, you may go.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [Michael and Holly cautiously pass each other] There's another dolly in the truck, Mike. You could take more than that lamp.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: For the record, I wanted go another direction. Which was way better.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Well, I'll be the judge of that. What do you got?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay. I lost my engagement ring in ceramics class. Left it in my smock. I had this whole thing where I go back to class, wrongly accuse another girl. Look I even used makeup to put a ring around my finger, you can hardly see it, it's very subtle.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That is good.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Truthfully anything would have been better than that prank. [laughs] Oh, text message from my brother. "Pam cool. Welcome to the family."

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh. Hey how about at Thanksgiving we prank Tom about being bald?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: This is the last of it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh that's mine actually. Um, maybe put it back in the truck.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: You're not staying?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You know I have some things I need to do this weekend. I just remembered, so, I'll just ride back with you.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: But you want me to put it back in the truck.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I'll be down in just a second. [into house] Holly?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: So um... I think I'm gonna go back with Darryl [Holly hugs Michael] Okay. [they kiss goodbye.] Goodbye.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Okay. Bye.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I know it's hard Mike. Break-ups hurt.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We didn't break up.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Looked like it. Sometimes when I'm down like this, it helps to sing the blues.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [bluesy] Da na na na na... da na na na na...

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That's a really pretty song.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Da na na na na. No, no, check it out, look. Da na na na na... want to do that?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: That's when you hit me with what's getting you down, okay?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: No, wait. You're, you're supposed to... Never mind. Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Da na na na na!!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Da na na na na!!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Da na na na na .

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [deeper] Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Yeah! Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [deeper] Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: YEAH! Da na na na na.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [blues singer] Da na na na na...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [Whistling, enters office in farmer overalls] I thought I'd come in casual today. Man, I'm hungry. Anyone else feel like a beet?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Where did you get those?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What, these? Bernard Farms. Best beets in the state.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I see what you are doing. But I do not know where you are going with this.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Well you will. Soon as you visit, my new beet farm. [attempts to bite into a raw beet, beet is too hard] You're supposed to cook these, aren't you?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [scoffs] Cornell. [easily bites into a beet]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: We'll miss you.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Well, I'll be around.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [chuckling] Isn't it a seven-hour drive?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: It's not that bad. But if I'm really jonesing to see you guys, I can always fly.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I don't know if it'll be shorter to fly. [Holly gasps] You have to drive to Boston, right? That's an hour and a half. Get there an hour before the flight. Now you're up two and a half hours. The flight to Philadelphia is an hour fifteen. It's another two and a half hour drive to Scranton, assuming there's no traffic, because....

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [interrupting Oscar] Well, I just want to say goodbye. [hugs Oscar]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Bye.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Well, Hol, this is it.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yeah, okay. [extends hand to Kevin]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [outstretches arms for a hug, Holly reluctantly complies]

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [whispers in Holly's ear, Holly reacts with horrified look]

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [pushing Kevin away] Um, yeah, that's not gonna happen.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yeah, but you have to admit it would be wild.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: So, you're dumping Michael? Smart.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No, we're gonna do the long-distance thing.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Oh! You guys are gonna keep dating? That's so romantic!

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yeah, thanks.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: I almost quit my job so I could be closer to Bob, and we're in the same building.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh, well....look, we could always call, or email, or write. I should get all your email addresses.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Yes, we'll email you, and then you'll have our addresses.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [talking head] It's a little sad. Michael and I just started dating. He wants me to stay and get a job around here as a baker. Or a baker's helper.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [talking head] This is gonna be awesome. This is gonna be awesome. I've decided that on my drives to Nashua, I am going to learn French, the language of love. And on my drives back, I am going to learn Spanish; what the cleaning crew speaks.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [talking head] I'm driving them up for five times what I would've made at work. I thought I made a good deal. [expression changes from smiling to downcast] Then I realized I'm gonna be trapped in a truck with Mike all day.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [playing cat's cradle with Holly] Okay, am I grabbing this one?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [chuckling] No, that's not what you're grabbing.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Put....okay....

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [driving truck] Hey, y'all are not gonna be playing these little private games all the way.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Sorry, Darryl.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: It's like Driving Miss Daisy, you know?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: All right.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: You gotta include me in the conversation.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Fair enough.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: If you don't mind.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, okay. What kind of car games did you play in the 'hood?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I got a game. Cow surfing.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Cow surfing?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Spot a cow, last person to say "Jackson Five" has to get on its back and ride it.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Were there even cows where you grew up?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Everybody got a government cow.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Cow surfing. [spots a cow out the window] Okay, here we go, there's a cow.

Quote.Speaker: Holly & Darryl
Quote.Text: [in unison] Jackson Five!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, shoot! Okay. All right. All right. [throws up hands] Pull it over. Here we go.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Here we go. Go get him, Mike!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [reaching to open door] I'm gonna do it.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [grabs Michael's arm] No, Michael. It's not a real game.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Then why did you say "Jackson Five?"

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: The man has a point.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Darryl....

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: All right, I made it up.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [visibly shocked] What? Why?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Because I wanted you to like me.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [gasps] I do! Hey, come on!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [trying not to laugh] Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Jackson Five.

Quote.Speaker: Holly & Michael
Quote.Text: [both laugh hysterically at portable DVD player on dashboard while Darryl drives, looking miserable]

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [makes sudden sharp turn to the left, causing DVD player to fall out open window, then grins to camera]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [rubbing noses with Holly] You're the one.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No, you.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You are.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You are.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: No, you are.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You are more.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [rubs face in exasperation]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You're the best.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You're better.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: You're better. You're better than my best.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: You're better than betterest.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [plants kisses all over Michael's face]

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Here we go.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Hold your breath!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Okay, Ready?

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [setting stopwatch] Go.

Quote.Speaker: Michael & Holly
Quote.Text: [both inhale deeply and lock lips while holding their breath]

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [looks to camera for several seconds] At least it's quiet.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Watch this. Darryl, watch this.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Look, Darryl, lip up.

Quote.Speaker: Michael & Holly
Quote.Text: [kiss each other while puffing their cheeks and mumbling]

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Down, and give me 50!

Quote.Speaker: Michael & Holly
Quote.Text: [in unison while kissing with mouths closed] One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Hey, you know what would be fun? Like, sleeping.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: You know.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [hugging Michael] Oh, snuggles!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah. Right, snuggle time.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Snuggles.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: There you go.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [makes squeaking sounds]

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Spooning.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Here's what I was thinking. The following weekend, I drive up.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Mmm hmm.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We get right in the car, we pop up to Montreal. It's like another seven hours.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Ooh!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Speak.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: We could stay in a cozy B&B with a fireplace?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Absolutely. Oh, and you know what, Darryl? You are invited to go as well.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Oh, thanks. Thanks. No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Come on, it'll be fun.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Thank you. Thank you. No.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [emerging from convenience store with two ice cream sundaes] Hey, look at that. Fun, right?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Mmm.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Mmm mmm! Remember the 15-scooper we had last week? Wasn't that good? I was Scooperman, you were Scoopy-Doo. Remember what you said? You were laughing.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Say what you said.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: No, Michael. I don't....[mimicking Scooby-Doo] I'm gonna puke!

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [laughs] I'll save you! I'm Superman! Scooperman!

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Darryl didn't want any?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: I didn't ask.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: We want the same things.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I know, but from seven hours away.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: That is a lucky number. Seven. 7-Up. Seven dwarfs.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Michael....

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Seven deadly sins. It's a sign.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Hey, y'all wanna hear some loud music or something?

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: I'm an atheist. Did you know that? I don't know your religion. There are so many conversations that we haven't even had yet.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Hey, look, Pennsylvania license plate! That's crazy! All the way out here! Who can name all the states?

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [standing with Holly next to "Welcome to New Hampshire" sign] Oh, it's really cold here.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: Oh, it's just later.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [holding camera] Here we go.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: [starts to cry] Can we have another? I think I blinked.

Quote.Speaker: Holly
Quote.Text: [unlocking front door] This is me here.

Quote.Speaker: Michael
Quote.Text: Oh, you have your own entrance. That's nice.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Stairs. Oh, man....

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: He's just trying to push your buttons.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I don't care, so it doesn't matter.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Great, then it doesn't matter.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You don't think he could get in, though....right? I mean, I don't care, but I just don't see how he could. I doubt he could get in.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [reverently] He is fiercely intelligent.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I don't care either way, so....shut up.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: He's just....

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [in parking lot on cell phone] Don't tell me to calm down, Dad! [grunts] Don't do that! Oh, God, of all people, I thought you would understand. You're an alum. This guy, he's....he's poking the bear! [listens briefly] Yeah, okay, I'll see you at Thanksgiving. Hi to Mom. Bye.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Why are you doing this to Andy?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You once told me that Andy and I had different strengths. Well, he can't do what I can do. I can get into Cornell, but he doesn't know how to make food and shelter from a golden retriever.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [looks at Dwight disgustedly and sighs] Even if you do somehow get in, that's not going to make me leave Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, but it'll make you respect him less.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: [sighs] Yes, that's true.
